title: priorities
comment: Scripture stresses that God must be allowed to rule at the heart of a person's life.

children.title: priority, of God
children.comment: Scripture provides examples of individuals who have allowed God to take priority in their lives, and also of those who have allowed something or someone else to take priority.

children.title: God's glory made a priority
Commands to put God first
Examples of putting God first
Disapproval of not putting God first
Examples of not putting God first
Worship commended as the highest human activity
Outstanding examples of worship

primaryrefs.comment: David was prepared to be despised by his wife rather than inhibit his worship.

children.title: God's kingdom made a priority
Commands to participate in the kingdom
Examples of wholehearted participation
Warning against half-hearted participation
Sacrifices for the kingdom advocated
Examples of sacrifices for the kingdom
God's will made a priority
Conformity to God's will commanded
Outstanding examples of conformity to God's will
priority, of faith, hope and love
children.comment: Putting God first--living according to his word--serves the glory of God and also the best interests of believers, by giving them true wisdom for daily living.

children.title: The wisdom of making faith a priority
Putting the fear of God before other considerations
Preferring God's way to sinful advice
Choosing imaginative action rather than laziness or fearfulness
Patient waiting rather than impetuous action
The wisdom of making hope a priority
Putting true riches above earthly wealth
Putting eternal joy before temporal hardship
The wisdom of making love a priority

primaryrefs.comment: Paul's concern that love, rather than competition over spiritual gifts, should be made a priority.

children.title: Loyalty rather than opportunism

seealsos.comment: Demas' love for this world rather than loyalty

children.title: Following the Spirit rather than sinful human nature

primaryrefs.comment: Merely ``human'' activity betrays a failure of love for God.

children.title: Inner sincerity rather than outward appearance
Actions rather than mere words
Peace rather than disharmony
Truth rather than falsehood
